prompts: Create a bipedal Pokemon that has a strong resemblance to a knight with a green and brown color scheme.
Imagine a Pokemon that is a protector of the forest, featuring armor-like spikes and large leafy wings.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies resilience, with a shell-like body and a nature-inspired design.
Design a Pokemon that uses its shield-like features in battle, showcasing vibrant green and earthy tones.
Show me a Pokemon that combines the strength of a warrior with the gentleness of nature, having a unique color palette.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in forest environments and has a mix of defensive and offensive capabilities.
Give me a Pokemon that can evolve into a powerful protector with an impressive stature and fierce appearance.

distinctive_features: Prominent facial features resembling a helmet
